articles.description: A young Syracuse team still hasn't developed enough to play against competition like Duke

articles.description: The Caniacs came out in force in support of their teams first ever outdoor game.
articles.content:

articles.title: Iowa City High's Cale Seaton, Gabe Arnold, Ben Kueter shine in 3A state wrestling finals - Des Moines Register
articles.description: On a night when so many stars delivered in the Class 3A state wrestling finals, Iowa City High's three champs may have shined the brightest.
